title: Cheese or Font
content:
[http://cheeseorfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418162120/http:/cheeseorfont.com/ "http://cheeseorfont.com")

Must've been posted before, I'm sure, but it's still great :)
author: apankrat

comments.content:
It's old and inaccurate.  
Beaufort® is apparently not a font, much to my surprise.  
I didn't check any others, but Googling the name + "font" might have been a good idea.

I only clicked on Cheese ...scored .7% above class avg.

:)
obviously more fonts need to be named after cheeses.
Look out for my forthcoming "Hungarian Goat's Milk" in the Release section.

Beaufort is an appellation d'origine contrôlée.

You are not entitled to produce a font called Beaufort.

André
Pretty sure that would only apply to cheesy fonts.
